pages.text: $(li)The Pulley Block has a single inventory slot which allows any kind of Chain and $(l:patchouli:tools/supplementaries/rope)Ropes (Supplementaries)$(/l).

$(li)When a $(l:patchouli:redstone/supplementaries/turn_table)Turn Table$(/l) rotates a Pulley Block, it will deploy or retract the items it's holding in its inventory depending if it's getting rotated clock-wise or counter clock-rise.$(br)$(li)If a Rope below it is retracted manually by shift clicking, the resulting Rope item will get redirected in the pulley inventory.

$(li)When rotated it will also rotate all the pulleys adjacent to it that are facing the same axis.$(br)$(li)Just like ropes, pulling up or down chains and ropes with a pulley will also bring up and down the last block attached to the chain.
